name: Pyramid

name: Louvre Museum
description: The Louvre, or the Louvre Museum, is the world's most-visited museum and a historic monument in Paris, France.

name: Maldives
description: Maldives, officially the Republic of Maldives, is an archipelagic state in the Indian subcontinent of Asia, situated in the Indian Ocean.

name: Tajmahal
description: An immense mausoleum of white marble, built in Agra between 1631 and 1648 by order of the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his favourite wife.
